A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Utterly abysmal.
Could not even maintain continuity with the previous episode never mind the other the films.
Lazer swords FFS? Poor Mark Hamill. Luke's character was treated so shabbily.
The hyperspace ram removes all jeopardy from the previous films and all subsequent space battles; predicated by the most pointless space chase ever conceived. How come a Star Destroyer was able to catch up with and engulf  Leia's ship in the first minutes of A "New Hope" but now suddenly the Empire ships can't keep up?
The space-cow milking scene. That had to be a director dig or "in-joke" about milking the franchise. Just horrendous. Chewie was the only thing left untainted. Awful\, awful\, awful.
